results.title: Metformin inhibits inflammation and bone destruction in collagen-induced arthritis in rats
results.text_hl: After @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ treatment, @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@ symptoms were significantly relieved from day 26.

results.title: Disease-Modifying Potential of Metformin and Alendronate in an Experimental Mouse Model of Osteoarthritis
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Alendronate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019386 @@@alendronate@@@, and their combination decreased serum concentrations of @GENE_LEP @GENE_16846 @@@leptin@@@ and @GENE_RETN @GENE_57264 @@@resistin@@@ in the chronic phase of @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@.

results.title: Metformin has anti-inflammatory effects and induces immunometabolic reprogramming in hidradenitis suppurativa via multiple mechanisms.
results.text_hl: Since @DISEASE_Hidradenitis_Suppurativa @DISEASE_MESH:D017497 @@@HS@@@ is highly @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@, we hypothesise that energy metabolism is dysregulated in these patients. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, the anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ drug, which is known to impact cellular metabolic and signalling pathways, has been shown to have anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects in @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Arthritis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001168 @@@arthritis@@@.

results.title: Prevalence of chronic diseases in older Palestinian adults and common pharmacological interventions: a cross-sectional study.
results.text_hl: Commonly prescribed therapeutic agents were @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@aspirin@@@ (prescribed to 48% of participants, 575 of 1192), angiotensin-converting-enzyme inhibitors (34%, 403), diuretics (34%, 409), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (27%, 323), @CHEMICAL_Acetaminophen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000082 @@@paracetamol@@@ (23%, 270), and protein pump inhibitors (23%, 275).
